---
title: "Exalt"
author: "C.O."
date: "November 2025"
draft: true
---

Psalms 99:5 tells us to exalt the LORD for HE is HOLY! When we think about the LORD and all that HE is, praises should fill us. Think on the love, mercy and grace that is extended to us. The provision and protection we receive. Let us exalt HIS name HE is worthy!

Meditate on these verses to gain wisdom:

-   Week 1
    -   Psalms 21:13
-   Week 2
    -   Isaiah 12:4
-   Week 3
    -   Acts 2:36
-   Week 4
    -   Philippians 2:9
